com.opendxl.databus.entities

Class RoutingData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opendxl.databus.entities.RoutingData

  • public class RoutingData
extends java.lang.Object

    Represent a address where a message must be sent. It is used by ProducerRecord to know what the destination is. It contains a mandatory topic name as well as optionals sharding key and tenant group and partitions.

    See how to use in DatabusProducer example
